content.rendered:
On March 4, 3 PM (UTC), we’ll have Travala.com, the world’s leading blockchain-based travel booking platform, at our AMA session on Telegram! The project will be represented by Juan Otero, Co-Founder & CSO, and the Travala’s team.

The rules are:

  • Learn about the project we’re hosting
  • Join the live session in our Telegram chat
  • Pass the quiz (link to google forms will be shared at the AMA)
  • Take part in the live chat with Travala

The pool for the AMA with Travala.com is $1500 AVA.

  • $1050 for all quiz participants, who pass it successfully
  • $450 will be shared between users who ask the best questions on Twitter or in the live chat.

To pass the quiz – learn about Travala.

Create an account on Travala.com.

Download Atomic wallet to get AVA-address!

Subscribe to our Twitter:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Travala.com

Subscribe to Telegram channels:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Travala.com

The Google forms will be sent during the session in our Telegram chat. Don’t miss it out!

excerpt.rendered: On March 4, 3 PM (UTC), we’ll have Travala.com, the world’s leading blockchain-based travel booking platform, at our AMA session on Telegram! The project will be represented by Juan Otero, Co-Founder & CSO, and the Travala’s team.
